title: 107_s2881
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from an eligible employee's gross income amounts paid or incurred by the employer of such employee as part of a homeownership assistance program meeting specified criteria. Sets as a maximum exclusion for one eligible employee an amount equal to 10 percent of the maximum principal obligation for a mortgage insured under the National Housing Act with respect to the residence purchased. Limits participation to first-time homebuyers with incomes below specified levels. Prohibits the exclusion for employees buying residences with prices in excess of 90 percent of the maximum principal obligation for a mortgage insured under the National Housing Act with respect to the residence. Reduces the basis in a residence by the amount of the exclusion.
